aircraft.value: Spectre Night - AC-3405-356 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Canopy seal deterioration. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 16/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 18/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 21/08/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 23/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 22/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Canopy seal deterioration. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
